Summary: Enormus fleet of ships hovering in night sky and beaming a large sequential light pattern miles across the night sky
trends: There have been no other sightings in Rosendale
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving down to Brooklyn from upstate NY on July 6 2013. When the night sky became illuminated with may lights, over 25 of them hovering around in many colors. One of the many began omitting unbelievable light beams that sequentially flashed miles across the night sky. Almost like a message of some kind. May be on of the biggest invasions of all time. 25+ ships projecting a light show miles across the sky.
